wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Geoffrey Birch Wilson (11 June 1903 – 11 April 1975) was a Conservative party politician in the United Kingdom.  Wilson served as Member of Parliament (MP) for Truro from its re-creation by boundary changes in 1950 until his retirement in 1970.
